segments.source_content: Installing dependencies

translations.zh-hant: 安裝依賴套件

segments.source_content: You will need Node, the React Native command line interface, a JDK, and Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要安裝 Node、React Native 命令行工具、JDK 和 Android Studio。

segments.source_content: While you can use any editor of your choice to develop your app, you will need to install Android Studio in order to set up the necessary tooling to build your React Native app for Android.

translations.zh-hant: 雖然您可以使用任何喜歡的編輯器開發應用程式，但必須安裝 Android Studio 才能設置建置 React Native Android 應用程式所需的工具鏈。

segments.source_content: Node, JDK

translations.zh-hant: Node 與 JDK

segments.source_content: We recommend installing Node via [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/install), a popular package manager for Windows.

translations.zh-hant: 我們建議透過 Windows 熱門套件管理工具 [Chocolatey](https://chocolatey.org/install) 安裝 Node。

segments.source_content: It is recommended to use an LTS version of Node. If you want to be able to switch between different versions, you might want to install Node via [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows), a Node version manager for Windows.

translations.zh-hant: 建議使用 Node 的 LTS 版本。若需切換不同版本，可透過 Windows 的 Node 版本管理工具 [nvm-windows](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows) 安裝。

segments.source_content: React Native also requires [Java SE Development Kit (JDK)](https://openjdk.java.net/projects/jdk/17/), which can be installed using Chocolatey as well.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 還需要 [Java SE 開發套件 (JDK)](https://openjdk.java.net/projects/jdk/17/)，同樣可透過 Chocolatey 安裝。

segments.source_content: Open an Administrator Command Prompt (right click Command Prompt and select "Run as Administrator"), then run the following command:

translations.zh-hant: 以系統管理員身分開啟命令提示字元（對命令提示字元按右鍵選擇「以系統管理員身分執行」），然後執行以下指令：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
choco install -y nodejs-lts microsoft-openjdk17
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_93be3c14

segments.source_content: If you have already installed Node on your system, make sure it is Node 18.18 or newer. If you already have a JDK on your system, we recommend JDK17. You may encounter problems using higher JDK versions.

translations.zh-hant: 若系統已安裝 Node，請確認版本為 18.18 或更新。若已安裝 JDK，建議使用 JDK17。使用更高版本的 JDK 可能會遇到問題。

segments.source_content: > You can find additional installation options on [Node's Downloads page](https://nodejs.org/en/download/).

translations.zh-hant: > 您可以在 [Node 下載頁面](https://nodejs.org/en/download/) 找到其他安裝選項。

segments.source_content: > If you're using the latest version of Java Development Kit, you'll need to change the Gradle version of your project so it can recognize the JDK. You can do that by going to `{project root folder}\android\gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties` and changing the `distributionUrl` value to upgrade the Gradle version. You can check out [here the latest releases of Gradle](https://gradle.org/releases/).

translations.zh-hant: > 若使用最新版 Java 開發套件，需變更專案的 Gradle 版本以相容 JDK。請至 `{專案根目錄}\android\gradle\wrapper\gradle-wrapper.properties` 修改 `distributionUrl` 值來升級 Gradle 版本。可參考 [Gradle 最新發佈版本](https://gradle.org/releases/)。

segments.source_content: Android development environment

translations.zh-hant: Android 開發環境

segments.source_content: Setting up your development environment can be somewhat tedious if you're new to Android development. If you're already familiar with Android development, there are a few things you may need to configure. In either case, please make sure to carefully follow the next few steps.

translations.zh-hant: 若您是 Android 開發新手，設置開發環境可能較為繁瑣。若已有經驗，則只需調整部分設定。無論如何，請仔細遵循後續步驟。

segments.source_content: 1. Install Android Studio

translations.zh-hant: 1. 安裝 Android Studio

segments.source_content: [Download and install Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html). While on Android Studio installation wizard, make sure the boxes next to all of the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: [下載並安裝 Android Studio](https://developer.android.com/studio/index.html)。在安裝精靈中，請確保勾選以下所有項目：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`
- If you are not already using Hyper-V: `Performance (Intel ® HAXM)` ([See here for AMD or Hyper-V](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2018/07/android-emulator-amd-processor-hyper-v.html))

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK`
- `Android SDK Platform`
- `Android Virtual Device`
- 若未使用 Hyper-V：`Performance (Intel ® HAXM)` ([AMD 或 Hyper-V 用戶請參閱此處](https://android-developers.googleblog.com/2018/07/android-emulator-amd-processor-hyper-v.html))

segments.source_content: Then, click "Next" to install all of these components.

translations.zh-hant: 接著點擊「Next」安裝所有元件。

segments.source_content: > If the checkboxes are grayed out, you will have a chance to install these components later on.

translations.zh-hant: > 若選項呈灰色不可勾選，後續仍可安裝這些元件。

segments.source_content: Once setup has finalized and you're presented with the Welcome screen, proceed to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 安裝完成並顯示歡迎畫面後，請繼續下一步。

segments.source_content: 2. Install the Android SDK

translations.zh-hant: 2. 安裝 Android SDK

segments.source_content: Android Studio installs the latest Android SDK by default. Building a React Native app with native code, however, requires the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK in particular. Additional Android SDKs can be installed through the SDK Manager in Android Studio.

translations.zh-hant: Android Studio 預設會安裝最新版 Android SDK。但使用原生碼建置 React Native 應用程式需特定安裝 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` SDK。可透過 Android Studio 的 SDK 管理員安裝其他版本。

segments.source_content: To do that, open Android Studio, click on "More Actions" button and select "SDK Manager".

translations.zh-hant: 開啟 Android Studio，點擊「More Actions」按鈕並選擇「SDK Manager」。

segments.source_content: ![Android Studio Welcome](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeWindows.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![Android Studio 歡迎畫面](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidStudioWelcomeWindows.png)

segments.source_content: > The SDK Manager can also be found within the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: > SDK 管理員也可在 Android Studio 的「Settings」對話框中找到，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Select the "SDK Platforms" tab from within the SDK Manager, then check the box next to "Show Package Details" in the bottom right corner. Look for and expand the `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` entry, then make sure the following items are checked:

translations.zh-hant: 在 SDK 管理器中選擇「SDK Platforms」標籤頁，然後勾選右下角的「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android 14 (UpsideDownCake)` 項目，確保以下項目已勾選：

segments.source_content:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` or `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

translations.zh-hant:
- `Android SDK Platform 34`
- `Intel x86 Atom_64 System Image` 或 `Google APIs Intel x86 Atom System Image`

segments.source_content: Next, select the "SDK Tools" tab and check the box next to "Show Package Details" here as well. Look for and expand the `Android SDK Build-Tools` entry, then make sure that `34.0.0` is selected.

translations.zh-hant: 接著選擇「SDK Tools」標籤頁，同樣勾選「Show Package Details」。找到並展開 `Android SDK Build-Tools` 項目，確保已選取 `34.0.0` 版本。

segments.source_content: Finally, click "Apply" to download and install the Android SDK and related build tools.

translations.zh-hant: 最後點擊「Apply」以下載並安裝 Android SDK 及相關建置工具。

segments.source_content: 3. Configure the ANDROID_HOME environment variable

translations.zh-hant: 3. 設定 ANDROID_HOME 環境變數

segments.source_content: The React Native tools require some environment variables to be set up in order to build apps with native code.

translations.zh-hant: React Native 工具需要設定一些環境變數才能建置包含原生代碼的應用程式。

segments.source_content:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Click on **New...** to create a new `ANDROID_HOME` user variable that points to the path to your Android SDK:

translations.zh-hant:
1. 開啟 **Windows 控制台**
2. 點擊 **使用者帳戶**，然後再次點擊 **使用者帳戶**
3. 點擊 **變更我的環境變數**
4. 點擊 **新增...** 以建立指向 Android SDK 路徑的新使用者變數 `ANDROID_HOME`：

segments.source_content: ![ANDROID_HOME Environment Variable](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidEnvironmentVariableANDROID_HOME.png)

translations.zh-hant: ![ANDROID_HOME 環境變數](/docs/assets/GettingStartedAndroidEnvironmentVariableANDROID_HOME.png)

segments.source_content: The SDK is installed, by default, at the following location:

translations.zh-hant: SDK 預設安裝於以下位置：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Android\Sdk
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_8a9e710a

segments.source_content: You can find the actual location of the SDK in the Android Studio "Settings" dialog, under **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**.

translations.zh-hant: 您可以在 Android Studio 的「設定」對話框中找到 SDK 的實際位置，路徑為 **Languages & Frameworks** → **Android SDK**。

segments.source_content: Open a new Command Prompt window to ensure the new environment variable is loaded before proceeding to the next step.

translations.zh-hant: 請開啟新的命令提示字元視窗，以確保新環境變數已載入，再繼續下一步。

segments.source_content:
1. Open powershell
2. Copy and paste **Get-ChildItem -Path Env:\\** into powershell
3. Verify `ANDROID_HOME` has been added

translations.zh-hant:
1. 開啟 powershell
2. 複製並貼上 **Get-ChildItem -Path Env:\\** 到 powershell
3. 確認 `ANDROID_HOME` 已新增

segments.source_content: 4. Add platform-tools to Path

translations.zh-hant: 4. 將 platform-tools 加入 Path

segments.source_content:
1. Open the **Windows Control Panel.**
2. Click on **User Accounts,** then click **User Accounts** again
3. Click on **Change my environment variables**
4. Select the **Path** variable.
5. Click **Edit.**
6. Click **New** and add the path to platform-tools to the list.

translations.zh-hant:
1. 開啟 **Windows 控制台**
2. 點擊 **使用者帳戶**，然後再次點擊 **使用者帳戶**
3. 點擊 **變更我的環境變數**
4. 選取 **Path** 變數
5. 點擊 **編輯**
6. 點擊 **新增** 並將 platform-tools 的路徑加入清單

segments.source_content: The default location for this folder is:

translations.zh-hant: 此資料夾的預設位置為：

segments.source_content:
```powershell
%LOCALAPPDATA%\Android\Sdk\platform-tools
```

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_efbe5e3f

segments.source_content: Preparing the Android device

translations.zh-hant: 準備 Android 裝置

segments.source_content: You will need an Android device to run your React Native Android app. This can be either a physical Android device, or more commonly, you can use an Android Virtual Device which allows you to emulate an Android device on your computer.

translations.zh-hant: 您需要一台 Android 裝置來執行 React Native Android 應用程式。這可以是實體 Android 裝置，或更常見的是使用 Android 虛擬裝置 (AVD)，讓您在電腦上模擬 Android 裝置。

segments.source_content: Either way, you will need to prepare the device to run Android apps for development.

translations.zh-hant: 無論哪種方式，您都需要準備裝置以執行開發用的 Android 應用程式。

segments.source_content: Using a physical device

translations.zh-hant: 使用實體裝置

segments.source_content: If you have a physical Android device, you can use it for development in place of an AVD by plugging it in to your computer using a USB cable and following the instructions [here](running-on-device.md).

translations.zh-hant: 如果您有實體 Android 裝置，可以透過 USB 線連接電腦，並按照[此處說明](running-on-device.md)來取代 AVD 進行開發。

segments.source_content: Using a virtual device

translations.zh-hant: 使用虛擬裝置

segments.source_content: If you use Android Studio to open `./AwesomeProject/android`, you can see the list of available Android Virtual Devices (AVDs) by opening the "AVD Manager" from within Android Studio. Look for an icon that looks like this:

translations.zh-hant: 如果使用 Android Studio 開啟 `./AwesomeProject/android`，可以透過 Android Studio 內的「AVD Manager」查看可用的 Android 虛擬裝置 (AVD) 清單。尋找如下圖示的圖標：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_11507d75

segments.source_content: If you have recently installed Android Studio, you will likely need to [create a new AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html). Select "Create Virtual Device...", then pick any Phone from the list and click "Next", then select the **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 image.

translations.zh-hant: 若您最近才安裝 Android Studio，可能需要[建立新的 AVD](https://developer.android.com/studio/run/managing-avds.html)。選擇「Create Virtual Device...」，然後從清單中任選一款手機，點擊「Next」，接著選取 **UpsideDownCake** API Level 34 映像檔。

segments.source_content: > If you don't have HAXM installed, click on "Install HAXM" or follow [these instructions](https://github.com/intel/haxm/wiki/Installation-Instructions-on-Windows) to set it up, then go back to the AVD Manager.

translations.zh-hant: > 若尚未安裝HAXM，請點擊「安裝HAXM」或遵循[這些指示](https://github.com/intel/haxm/wiki/Installation-Instructions-on-Windows)進行設置，完成後返回AVD管理員。

segments.source_content: Click "Next" then "Finish" to create your AVD. At this point you should be able to click on the green triangle button next to your AVD to launch it.

translations.zh-hant: 點擊「下一步」後點擊「完成」以建立您的AVD。此時您應可點擊AVD旁的綠色三角形按鈕來啟動模擬器。

segments.source_content: That's it!

translations.zh-hant: 大功告成！

segments.source_content: Congratulations! You successfully set up your development environment.

translations.zh-hant: 恭喜！您已成功設置開發環境。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_349bca41

segments.source_content: Now what?

translations.zh-hant: 接下來呢？

segments.source_content:
- If you want to add this new React Native code to an existing application, check out the [Integration guide](integration-with-existing-apps.md).
- If you're curious to learn more about React Native, check out the [Introduction to React Native](getting-started).

translations.zh-hant:
- 若需將此React Native程式碼整合至現有應用程式，請參閱[整合指南](integration-with-existing-apps.md)。
- 若想深入瞭解React Native，請參閱[React Native入門指南](getting-started)。
